Blog.post: **My heart been broken in de rain++My heart is full of pain++U vanished from my eyesGiving me so much lies++I cry every nite whishing u were mine++But when I tok to u, u make evythng fine++U broke my heart n that’s a true crime++All I wanted was for u to take time++But u gave me lies to go far from me++I thought u were the perfect 1 4 me++But I was wrong as usual, I am the loser++U always been de winner n me de loser++My eyes are drowning of tears coz of uIt was simple 4 u 2 throw my heart away from uI lov u so much, I believed u lov meWhy? Why? Why? Why? Can’t u see?That my love for u isn’t a crime++But only my heart rhyme++ We thought that, that will never happen 2 us**

It hurts when I think of you But its impossible not to I wish I could let go But you dont know How much I miss you Everyday I pray that you will take All the things back All the horrible things you said And we could be a lover once again But that day hasnt come yet And I am not sure it ever will And I am willing to except that fact I wish I didnt dream of you But I just dont know how not to But someday I will And someday I'll move on And learn to live without you Someday you will free me And I will be ok But for now I just need to say I am trying to move on But something is holding me back Figuring it out is the hardest part yet Always I will care for you Nothing can take that away But right now I cant be your love For I am trying to spread my wings and fly away to a better place Please dont clip my wings I know its hard But you need to give me back my heart And let me have my brand new start....*** *... I Love You ...* *+*~*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+ StORY oF mY hEArT ...~* ~*u.u*~ Memories is treasure , no one can steal , parting is heart-ache, some of people will forget you when you're gone , but i will remember you no matter how long, i fe you know my heart only have you... i feels pain when i think of you .. let you go bcoz i love you... i will be the angel who always guarding , caring and blessing you always .. Love You ... zu ni xing fu~*** +*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+*+

[guy]:den u tell mi u love mi~ [gurl]:fined:i loved u:slow down!.> [guy]:now gimm mi a big huggies~ *gurl huggs guy* [guy]:can u take muii helmet off,and put it on~yourself~*its bugging mi* [in der news paper de next daes]a motorcycle had crashed into a building~cos of brak failure:: two people were on it*bud onli one survived~ de truth was that half wae down de roadx de guy realize that hid brak broke,bud he didn't::wan to let de gurl noex~* instead~he had her sae she loved him and felt her hug one las tyms den had her wear hid helmet so that shw ould live it mean that he would diex~ ~[ would u do this fer sumone]~~
